phy_linear_velocity_y: This variable can be used to get or to change the y component the instances linear velocity vector and is defined in pixels per second (for pixels per step, see phy_speed_y). Altering this for a static instance (ie: an instance with 0 density) will turn it into a kinematic instance
Real (single precision floating point value, or <tt>undefined</tt> if the instance is not physics enabled)
The above code will check the y component of the linear velocity vector and if it is anything other than 0 it will set it to 0.
